attributes.action: TO AMEND THE 2003  SEXUAL OFFENCES  CRIMINAL JUSTICE BILL RETROSPECTIVLY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish for an amendment in the law stating that if the offender admits raping or sexualy assaulting the victim after 2003 BUT the offences were before 2003, and this comes to light after the new 2003 criminal justice bill then the police and cps can enact on this evidence and act on any law in the 2003 justice bill that is relevant to the individual case eg;  Grooming and Abuse of trust

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
